summary: This is an internal email forwarding a New York Times article about a new lawsuit filed against Ghislaine Maxwell. It serves as a notification of breaking news related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of a new lawsuit mentioned in the forwarded New York Times article.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Mentioned in the context of the lawsuit against Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: Maxwell is the subject of a lawsuit related to Epstein's activities.

events.title: New Maxwell Lawsuit Filed
events.description: A new lawsuit is filed against Ghislaine Maxwell, as reported by the New York Times.

keyFacts: A new lawsuit was filed against Ghislaine Maxwell on March 18, 2020.
The lawsuit is related to the activities of Jeffrey Epstein.
The information was disseminated internally via email with a link to a New York Times article.
